actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the International Revenue Code of 1986 to provide economic incentives for the preservation of open space and conservation of natural resources, and for other purposes.
short_title: Paul Coverdell Homestead Open Space Preservation and Conservation Act of 2006

summary.text: Paul Coverdell Homestead Open Space Preservation and Conservation Act of 2006 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain tax-exempt conservation organizations a tax credit for expenditures to acquire and maintain real property interests exclusively for conservation purposes.

titles.title: Paul Coverdell Homestead Open Space Preservation and Conservation Act of 2006
A bill to amend the International Revenue Code of 1986 to provide economic incentives for the preservation of open space and conservation of natural resources, and for other purposes.
